name: injection-js
description: Dependency Injection library for JavaScript and TypeScript

scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc && rollup -c rollup.config.js -i dist/index.js > dist/injection.bundle.js && node tools/copy.js
scripts.format: eslint -c eslint.config.mjs lib/**/*.ts --fix && eslint -c eslint.config.mjs test/*.ts --fix
scripts.lint: eslint -c eslint.config.mjs lib/**/*.ts && eslint -c eslint.config.mjs test/*.ts
scripts.verify: tsc -p tools && npm run format && npm run lint

author: Minko Gechev <mgechev@gmail.com>
